long_description: The REI Endolyne shoulder bag blends a bit of outdoor performance with urban style and utility, resulting in a competent everyday commuter or travel bag with plenty of organization. Main compartment has a padded interior sleeve that fits an iPad, small tablets and most e-readers; single straight zipper under flap provides quick and easy top access. Fleece-lined pockets underneath magnetic-closure front flap protect phone and other small accessories; key clip keeps keys secure and easy to locate. Exterior back zipper pocket gives quick access to small items; side pockets expand to hold small water bottle or an umbrella. Adjustable-length shoulder strap with sliding shoulder pad provides secure and comfortable single shoulder carry; includes a carry handle. REI Endolyne shoulder bag is made of partially recycled, post-consumer fabric which holds up well against urban elements.
short_description: The REI Endolyne shoulder bag blends a bit of outdoor performance with urban style and utility, resulting in a competent everyday commuter or travel bag with plenty of organization.
